bib.title: Three attempts in PolEval 2017 Sentiment Analysis Task
bib.author: Ptaszynski, Michal and Masui, Fumito and Janz, Arkadiusz and Kocon, J and Piasecki, Maciej and Monika, ZZ and Dyba{\l}a, Pawe{\l}
bib.abstract: test bags compared with training bags (bottom up approach) – assign a label of the most similar bag • zapach_noun(root): { godny_adj(child) : positive, polecenie_noun(child): neutral }, label: positive • zapach_noun(root): { wart_adj(child) : positive, polecenie_noun(child): neutral }, label: ??? * godny_adj” maps to „godny.3” and „wart_adj” to „wart.1” - same synset! 8th Language & Technology Conference 29 Page 30. Jaccard Index on Big Bag of Features • Results  gives 73.6% 8th Language & Technology Conference 30 Page 31. Conclusions • PolEval 2017 Sentiment
